Package com.swe.justslidin.models

Class HitBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swe.justslidin.models.HitBox
  • public class HitBox
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create a frame around each element in our universe and is created to detect collisions

      This function updates the bottom side of the hitbox for the elements moving upwards in our universe

      This updates the left side of the hitbox for when the character moves left

      This updates the right side of the hitbox for when the character moves right
